facebook/lexical.summary: Recent activities include a pull request to upgrade the astro package to version 4.16.17 due to a moderate severity security vulnerability, as well as documentation updates to fix typos in the README.md file.

facebook/hermes.summary: A recent pull request was made to enable compilation with wasi-sdk, which requires significant changes due to its less Unix-like environment and lack of support for C++ exceptions, with the author attempting to find workarounds and alternatives for exception handling.
